entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Stop Calling JSON GetTypeInfo with the runtime type #47548
  • Hosting bundle still restarts on Repair and Uninstall when /norestart is passed #47544
    Infrastructure
  • Allow inheriting from a base page without requiring `base.BuildRenderTree(__builder)` #47538
  • ASP.NET Core metrics #47536

Closed

  • Components-e2e pipeline failing #47546
  • In Blazor's EditContext class, why is there no MarkAsModified method? #47497
  • Blazor United: Auto Generate API Layer and Frontend actions, so that a single component can work in both server and client render modes #47529
  • QuickGrid responsive table support #47294
  • Replace QueryStringEnumerable.SpanHelper with MemoryExtensions.Replace #47457
  • why fetch api can't get valid response when asp.net core return 401 status #47425

PullRequests

Created

  • Sanitize 0x7F in Content-Disposition filename #47549
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Pass /norestart to Hosting Bundle nested bundles #47545
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Pass /norestart to Hosting Bundle nested bundles #47543
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Update SDK; use ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIfEqual instead of n… #47540
    area-signalr
  • Extend ControllerBase.Problem that can add extensions to ProblemDetails #47539
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Update servicing milestones for May #47541
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • Pass /norestart to Hosting Bundle nested bundles #47542
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • Don't test for hard-coded ages in QuickGrid tests #47547
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0-preview4
  • Tweak RunHelix.ps1 to work on DevBox #47524
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • Replace SpanHelper.ReplacePlusWithSpace #47506
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Support zlib or raw deflate compression with 'deflate' content-coding #47522
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `2d4f208` to `b5fd99b` #47528
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `2d4f208` to `b5fd99b` #47527
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Add metrics to hosting and Kestrel #46834
    area-runtime
